casebody.data:
STATE
v.
James Anthony BARNETT, Jr. No. 36P16-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Feb. 5, 2016. Brendan O'Donnell, for Barnett, James Anthony (Jr.). *801Jennifer Harjo, Wilmington, for Barnett, James Anthony (Jr.). Iain M. Stauffer, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Anne M. Middleton, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Craig Blitzer, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th of February 2016 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of February 2016."
